# Keyword Groups {#sec-keygroups}



## Open Payments

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
open <- providertwo::load_openpayments()

open <- collapse::rsplit(open, ~ theme, keep.by = TRUE)
```
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
open_summary_all <- collapse::sbt(open$Summary, year == "All")

open_summary_all
```

## Provider Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prov <- providertwo::load_provider() |> collapse::colorder(theme, title)

prov <- collapse::rsplit(prov, ~ theme, keep.by = TRUE)
```
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dialysis_facilities <- prov$`Dialysis facilities`

dialysis_facilities
```
